attributes.action: Prevent Liverpool FC creating a new stadium and enforce the redevelopment of Anfield on its current grounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The atmosphere at Anfield needs to be preserved as a symbol of British sport. This preservation requires that LFC stay at Anfield. No ground move will ever take Anfield's unique atmosphere with it, and will signify the end of this unique sporting institution and the club itself.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
